summary: Fast paced, creative and driven. Energised by big challenges, organizational change, strategic decision making for competitive advantage and focused execution.

profile_positions.description:
· Focused on strategic advisory, building strategies and plans with clients for live negotiations and supporting them through the execution of these strategies.

· Managed multi-stream, multi-market, highly complex negotiations, coordinating projects to ensure stakeholder alignment and optimal negotiation outcomes for clients.

· Demonstrated a deep academic understanding of negotiation and a practical ability to adapt to different and highly ambiguous situations.

· Guided clients through complex decision-making processes, breaking down large-scale decisions into manageable sizes.

· Worked with clients to optimize their negotiation culture by analyzing their business processes, assessing people's capabilities, and calibrating organization incentives and structures to meet negotiation goals.

· Established expertise in AI and contributed to internal thought leadership and product development in this area, working closely with the Innovation and Content teams.

· Contribute thought leadership to the organization's website, knowledge bank, and bi-annual magazine, reinforcing industry expertise and commitment to sharing knowledge.
profile_positions.title: Manager - Negotiation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
· Established expertise in digital content delivery, incorporating streaming software and audio visual elements into workflow for improved virtual presence.

· Self-educated in real-time visual effect management, audio, and visual elements like studio lighting & green-screen use to enhance virtual communication.

· Expanded workshop delivery to global markets, covering Europe, Middle East, and Africa, showcasing adaptability and a broad business perspective.

· Gained insights into cultural negotiation and different market dynamics, applying this knowledge to advise clients effectively.

· Advised clients on broader strategies, such as segmentation, cultural negotiation, and talent development, demonstrating strategic thinking and a consultative approach.

· Nominated for an internal innovation award, recognizing the innovative practices brought into the role.

· Coached and trained new consultants to onboard them to the business and educate them as negotiation professionals
profile_positions.title: Senior Negotiation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
· Conducted negotiation workshops, training individuals across various industries such as retail, construction, tech, government contracting, FMCG, and pharmaceuticals.

· Engaged in thought leadership in the field of negotiation, contributing to the knowledge base in the industry.

· Developed a service portfolio model based on the concept of 'Negotiation Culture', aimed at supporting clients with both immediate negotiation needs and long-term business strategy.

· Managed key clients at C-suite level across Australia and New Zealand, showcasing adaptability to different industries and markets. Partnering as a consulting advisor on negotiation and commercial strategies.

· Created and executed the local marketing plan, coordinating industry events including webinars and panel discussions.

· Responded to the COVID-19 pandemic by designing a webinar on virtual negotiation, which was rolled out to dozens of clients and formed the foundation for a new product in our portfolio.

· Partnered with an internal team to realign and optimize our client proposition and commercial strategy, demonstrating strategic thinking and collaboration skills.
profile_positions.title: Negotiation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
· Led a team of 19, including 2 people managers, managing a channel that included over 3000 customers.

· Partnered with an internal consultant to optimize the territories of regional field representatives for increased efficiency, reducing costs and improving sales.

· Implemented a culture change program that addressed team dynamics and re-engaged members with the goals of the business.

· Introduced an incentive program for independent customers to better represent our brand in stores, providing support to the team during implementation.

· Trained two new account managers, helping them develop the necessary skills to succeed in their roles.

· Part of the sales leadership team for the UK&I market, accountable for the channel's forecast and quarterly target delivery.

· Initiated a cross-divisional cultural change program and chaired the committee, leading to reduced turnover and increased engagement.

· Worked with an internal consultant to optimize the Sales & Operations Planning process.

· Achieved a 13% net sales growth in our independents business.

· Successfully re-introduced 2 department store clients that the business lost during the merger.

· Initiated a project to set up a direct-to-consumer supply chain for our B2C business, including partner identification, cost analysis, and relationship negotiation.

· Partnered with local online-only retailers to expand our e-commerce presence
profile_positions.title: Customer Director

profile_positions.description:
· Managed a sales team for Tesco, Sainsburys, Waitrose & the country of Ireland during a business divestment and subsequent merger, showcasing adaptability and resilience during complex business transitions.

· Successfully negotiated trade terms twice with all clients, demonstrating effective negotiation skills and strategic thinking.

· Tackled complex supply chain issues, ensuring seamless product delivery despite logistical challenges.

· Oversaw the in-store execution of a Max Factor relaunch, enhancing brand visibility and sales.

· Managed the logistical changes of all product barcodes across all customers, demonstrating attention to detail and organizational skills. 

· Led range reviews, joint business planning, and price increase negotiations with all customers, directly or through the team.

· Developed a comprehensive forecasting system for sales, finance, and supply in Excel during a period of business transition. This included baseline and promotional program uplift expectations, a customizable order pattern, and a P&L that updated with actuals.

· This system was utilized for years after my tenure, showcasing the lasting impact of my initiatives.

· Led cross-divisional engagement, process design, and training for all users to implement the new system, demonstrating leadership, project management, and training skills.

· Formulated a local success model strategy for a hair care brand, focusing on the 4 P's of Marketing (Product, Price, Place, Promotion), leading to a successful launch across all retailers.

· Fostered the professional development of my team members, with one securing a promotion to Account Manager under my guidance, demonstrating effective mentorship and leadership skills.
profile_positions.title: Senior National Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
· Managed key accounts including Chemist Warehouse and Amcal in Australia. CWH was the most strategically important customer for the business at the time.

· Transitioned the relationship from a regionally managed account to a centrally managed account, improving efficiency and enhancing relationship management.

· Established effective ways of working with head office to optimize support for these key accounts.
Managed the entire P&L for all categories, demonstrating strong financial acumen and strategic planning.

· Led a direct report (Account Executive) responsible for all reporting for the wider pharmacy team, showing leadership and team management skills.

· Conducted demand planning, forecasting, promotional planning, and P&L management, showcasing strategic thinking and analytical skills.

· Optimized product mix to grow gross margin above sales.

· Negotiated internally for resources and support, showcasing strong negotiation and persuasion skills.

· Managed the challenge of price perception in the market, minimizing risk for other accounts due to aggressive pricing strategies of key customers.

· Owned the fastest-growing brand in Chemist Warehouse at the time, showing successful brand and account management. World class best-in-class execution recognition by global brand team. 

· Built partnerships on media buying to optimize reach for client campaigns by leveraging internally negotiated media rates.

· Introduced new data sources internally to better understand sales, improving data-driven decision-making.

· Developed reports to track warehouse levels and manage the risk of overstocks on forecasted sales, showing strong problem-solving and data management skills.
profile_positions.title: Senior National Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
· Assisted the Senior Brand Manager in co-ordinating marketing campaigns, including the internal launch of brand campaign.

· Managed marketing budgets effectively, ensuring optimal allocation of resources across different marketing initiatives.

· Supported the media buying process, helping to maximize brand exposure across various platforms.

· Collaborated with sales teams to ensure successful in-store brand executions.

· Partnered with the Senior Brand Manager to launch a new customer engagement strategy centered around seasonal events.

· Orchestrated brand partnerships, including a notable collaboration with a cookbook.

· Led a successful redesign of packaging for all products, bringing them into line with global standards.

· Created a new budget management tool in Excel, which was adopted as best practice across all brand teams, improving budget tracking and allocation efficiency.

· Provided valuable market insights to address global success model change requests relating to pack sizes and pricing strategy.

· Successfully defended against a competitor launch in the market, resulting in a 0.2% increase in market share from a base of approximately 70%.

· Assisted in the production of a TV campaign featuring a celebrity chef endorsement

· Worked with an internal team to optimize agency spend within the portfolio, ensuring efficient use of resources and maximizing return on investment.

· Improved trade-up strategy by optimizing the mix to incentivize add-on products like dishwasher cleaner and dishwasher freshener, leading to increased sales and enhanced customer value.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Brand Manager Marketing

profile_positions.description:
· Managed national sales accounts for major convenience chains including 7/11, Australia Post, UCB, OTR, Metcash, BP, Caltex, and Puma in the FMCG industry.

· Fostered new relationships with 7/11, Australia Post, and OTR, successfully expanding our brands to over 4,000 points of distribution.

· Drove 23% growth in the convenience market segment and improved gross margins by 25% 

· Leveraged data analysis to provide actionable insights for category growth, resulting in a strong sell-in of our brands and products.

· Had full P&L responsibility for promotional programs, from gross sales to GM, demonstrating a strong understanding of financial management.

· Oversaw the cleaning category in Metcash and IGA, including the successful launch of a new product range.

· Automated internal reporting processes for the Metcash/IGA/Independents/Convenience team, leading to increased efficiency in reporting and data management.

· Supported fellow National Account Managers on Metcash & IGA, fostering a collaborative work environment and sharing best practices for account management.
profile_positions.title: National Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
· Led field sales operations in the FMCG sector, responsible for visiting and nurturing relationships with independent stores throughout the region.

· Boosted sales growth by 14% in the assigned territory through effective negotiation and customer engagement strategies.

· Nominated for Sales Person of the Year for outstanding performance and commitment to company targets.

· Assisted retailers in optimizing shelf layouts and product spacing, leading to enhanced visual merchandising and increased sales.

· Initiated and sold in promotional activities, resulting in creative displays and further sales growth.

· Developed an efficient route plan for the territory, strategically deciding the frequency and priority of store visits to maximize sales and relationship building.

· Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills, effectively managing and adapting to the dynamic demands of the FMCG industry.
profile_positions.title: Field Sales Manager
